Pattern Library

image with caption component

IMAGES:

We recommend a minimum image width of 1600px for this component.

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • image
  • alternative image text (optional, but highly recommend for SEO)
  • caption (optional)
  • link (optional)
  • gradient - true or false, will display a black gradient along the bottom so that the caption text is more visible (optional, true is the default)
